nodes.text: Zyluria was a world located in the Zyluria system of the Juvex sector, a part of the Senex-Juvex region in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. A hyperlane linked it to the Carsanza system. Zyluria's surface featured gentle plains, and it was the homeworld of the Zylurians, a sentient species that, by 43 ABY, had long served the aristocratic Ancient Houses of the Senex-Juvex.
Zyluria was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-17.
